metadata.title: CVE-2022-32212 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A OS Command Injection vulnerability exists in Node.js versions <14.20.0,<16.20.0, <18.5.0 due to an insufficient IsAllowedHost check that caneasily be bypassed because IsIPAddress does not properly check if an IPaddress is invalid before making DBS requests allowing rebinding attacks.

criterions.comment: nodejs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
